GK16andhvc4u:1: caturtha uddyotaḥ evaṃ dhvaniṃ saprapañcaṃ vipratipattinirāsārthaṃ vyutpādya tadvyutpādane locanam caturtha uddyotaḥ kṛtyapañcakanirvāhayoge 'pi parameśvaraḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:6: tṛtīyodyotāvadhau ca satkāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātuṃ veti tadeveṣatsphuṭīkṛtaṃ,
GK16andhvc4u:12: kena ca satkāvyabodha iti viśeṣo nirūpyate /
GK16andhvc4u:13: bālapriyā atha caturthodyotaṭippaṇī prārabhyate arthodyotaṃ caturthe ca locanasya yathāmati /
GK16andhvc4u:17: yathoktaṃ---“pañcavidhaṃ tatkṛtyaṃ sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhāratirobhāvaḥ tadvadanugrahakaraṇaṃ proktaṃ satatoditasyāsya” iti /
GK16andhvc4u:34: satkāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātuṃ vā samyagabhiyuktaiḥ sadbhiḥ dhvaniḥ prayatnato vivecya
GK16andhvc4u:47: ya eṣa dhvanerguṇabhūtavyaṅgyasya ca mārgaḥ prakāśitastasya phalāntaraṃ kavipratibhānantyam /
GK16andhvc4u:50: vāṇī navatvam āyāti pūrvārthānvayavaty api // DhvK_4.2 //
GK16andhvc4u:53: locanam tatra satkāvyakaraṇe kathamasya vyāpāra iti pūrvaṃ vaktavyaṃ niṣpāditasya jñeyatvāditi taducyate--
GK16andhvc4u:60: tatra varṇanīyasya pārimityādādyakavinaiva spṛṣṭatvāt sarvasya tadviṣayaṃ pratibhānaṃ tajjātīyameva syāt /
GK16andhvc4u:61: tataśca kāvyamapi tajjātīyameveti bhraṣṭa idānīṃ kaviprayogaḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:62: uktavaicitryeṇa tu ta evārthā niravadhayo bhavantīti tadviṣayāṇāṃ pratibhānāmānantyamupapannamiti /
GK16andhvc4u:63: nanu pratibhānantyasya kiṃ phalamiti nirṇetuṃ vāṇī navatvamāyātītyuktaṃ,
GK16andhvc4u:75: prathamakārikottarārdhena dvitīyakārikayā ca vakṣyamāṇo bhāvārthaḥ pradarśito bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:93: ato dhvaneruktaprabhedamadhyādanyatamenāpi prakāreṇa vibhūṣitā satī vāṇī purātanakavinibaddhārthasaṃsparśavatyapi navatvamāyāti /
GK16andhvc4u:95: 'pi yathā--- smitaṃ kiñcinmugdhaṃ taralamadhuro dṛṣṭivibhavaḥ parispando vācāmabhinavavilāsorbhisarasaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:96: gatānāmārambhaḥ kisalayitalīlāparimalaḥ spṛśantyāstāruṇyaṃ kimiva hi na ramyaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:100: taiḥ smitādeḥ prasiddhasyārthasya sthaviravedhovihitadharmavyatirekeṇa dharmāntarapātrāta yāvat kriyate,
GK16andhvc4u:102: asyeti apūrvatvameva bhāsata iti dūreṇa sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:109: abhinavā ye vilāsāstātkālikā viśeṣāsteṣāmūrmibhiḥ uttarottaramutpadyamānābhiḥ paramparābhiḥ sarasaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:110: kisalayitaḥ kisalayasambandhī līlāyāḥ parimalo yatra tathābhūtaḥ. mohayatīti vyutpattyā
GK16andhvc4u:111: mohakāritvaṃ “mugdhā navavayaḥkāme“tyādinā lakṣitaṃ laugdhyaṃ vā yattadvānmugdhaśabdasya mukhyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:113: teṣāmatra bādhāttatsādṛśyena nimittena mugdhādiśabdāḥ smitādīn lakṣayanti,
GK16andhvc4u:114: tena ca smitādīnāṃ saundaryaviśeṣādikaṃ dyotyata ityāha--mugdhetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:120: atra yathāsaṃkhyaṃ tena smitasya anāhṛtamakṛtrimaṃ saundaryam /
GK16andhvc4u:138: tathā-- yaḥ prathamaḥ prathamaḥ sa tu tathāhi hatahastibahalapalalāśī /
GK16andhvc4u:143: vivakṣitānyaparavācyasyāpyuktaprakārasamāśrayeṇa navatvaṃ yathā-- nidrākaitavinaḥ priyasya vadane vinyasya vakraṃ vadhūḥ bodhatrāsaniruddhacumbanarasāpyābhogalolaṃ sthitā /
GK16andhvc4u:146: evaṃ siṃhaśabdo 'pi vīratvānapekṣatvavismayanīyatvādau vyaṅgyadharmāntare saṅkrāntaṃ svārthaṃ dhvanati /
GK16andhvc4u:153: bodhatrāsena priyatamaprabodhabhayena niruddho haṭhāt pravartamānaḥ pravartamāno
GK16andhvc4u:154: 'pi kathañcitkathañcit bālapriyā caturṇā varṇane 'pi tadapekṣayā smitaṃ kiñcidityādau
GK16andhvc4u:173: dhṛtaḥ vailakṣyādvimukhībhavediti punastasyāpyanārambhiṇaḥ sākāṅkṣapratipatti nāma hṛdayaṃ yātaṃ tu pāraṃ rateḥ // //
GK16andhvc4u:175: śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanādutthāya kiñcicchanai- rnidrāvyājamupāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyurmukham /
GK16andhvc4u:176: visrabdhaṃ paricumbya jātapulakāmālokya gaṇḍasthalīṃ lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā // //
GK16andhvc4u:179: ata eva ābhogena punaḥ punarnidrāvicāranirvarṇanayā vilolaṃ kṛtvā sthitā,
GK16andhvc4u:182: tadvilakṣā vimukhībhavediti tasyāpi priyasya paricumbanaviṣaye nirārambhasya /
GK16andhvc4u:184: sākāṅkṣā sābhilāṣā pratipattiḥ sthitiryasya tādṛśaṃ ruhiruhikākadarthitaṃ na tu manorathasampatticaritārthaṃ,
GK16andhvc4u:185: kintu retaḥ parasparajīvitasarvasvābhimānarūpāyāḥ paranirvṛteḥ kena cidapyanubhavenālabdhāvagāhanāyāḥ pāraṅgatamiti paripūrṇībhūta eva śṛṅgāraḥ
GK16andhvc4u:186: dvitīyaśloke tu paricumbanaṃ sampannaṃ lajjā svaśabdenoktā /
GK16andhvc4u:187: tenāpi sā paricumbiteti yadyapi poṣita eva śṛṅgāraḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:191: nidrāvicāreṇa ayaṃ nidrātīti buddhyā yā nirvarṇanā darśanaṃ tayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:213: parasparābhilāṣaprasarasya yā nirodhaparamparā tasyā yatparyavasān ityādiślokasya 'nānābhaṅgibhramadbhūḥ' ityādiślokāpekṣayānyatvam /
GK16andhvc4u:215: mitho 'py anantatāṃ prāptaḥ kāvya-mārgo yadāśrayāt // DhvK_4.3 //
GK16andhvc4u:218: bahuvistāro 'yaṃ rasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamanalakṣaṇo mārgo yathāsvaṃ vibhāvānubhāvaprabhedakalanayā yathoktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc4u:220: yasya rasāderāśrayādayaṃ kāvyamārgaḥ purātanaiḥ kavibhiḥ sahasra saṃkhyairasaṃkhyairvā bahuprakāraṃ kṣuṇṇatvānmitho 'pyanantatāmeti /
GK16andhvc4u:222: teṣāṃ caikaikaprabhedāpekṣayāpi tāvajjagadvṛttamupanibadhyamānaṃ sukavibhistadicchāvaśādanyathā sthitamapyanyathaiva vivartate /
GK16andhvc4u:230: tasyāṅgānāṃ prabhedā ye prabhedāḥ svagatāśca ye /
GK16andhvc4u:247: dvitīyodyotodāhṛtaṃ tatpadyaṃ tu yathā tadudāharaṇaṃ bhavati,
GK16andhvc4u:260: atahaṭṭhie vi tahasaṇṭhie vva hiaammi jā ṇivesei /
GK16andhvc4u:274: hṛdayaniviṣṭā eva ca tathā bhavanti nānyathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:283: ata evāsya ślokasya vṛttigranthe vyākhyānaṃ na kṛtam /
GK16andhvc4u:289: samastabhāvāḥ sakalapadārthā eva kanakāni teṣāṃ nikaṣasthāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:296: vikaṭaḥ kavigocaro yasyā iti vyutpattimabhipretya vivṛṇoti--kavigocara ityādi // 3 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:308: dṛṣṭa-pūrvā api hy arthāḥ kāvye rasa-parigrahāt /
GK16andhvc4u:309: sarve navā ivābhānti madhu-māsa iva drumāḥ // DhvK_4.4 //
GK16andhvc4u:311: sarve navā ivābhānti madhumāsa iva drumāḥ // 4 //
GK16andhvc4u:314: śeṣo himagiristvaṃ ca mahānto guravaḥ sthirāḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:329: bahiḥ pratyakṣādibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prāktanaiśca kavibhirityubhayathā neyam /
GK16andhvc4u:333: etāni codāharaṇāni vitatya pūrvameva vyākhyātānīti kiṃ punarukaktyā satyapi prāktanakavispṛṣṭatve
GK16andhvc4u:345: iasonhāeṃ taha kaho jaha kaṇḍakaraṇḍaaṃ vahai // //
GK16andhvc4u:347: hatasnuṣayā tathā kṛto yathā kāṇḍakaraṇḍakaṃ vahati //
GK16andhvc4u:355: rasādi-maya ekasmin kaviḥ syād avadhānavān // DhvK_4.5 //
GK16andhvc4u:358: asminnarthānantyahetau vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāve vicitraṃ śabdānāṃ sambhavatyapi kavirapūrvārthalābhārthī rasādimaya ekasmin vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāve yatnādavadadhīta /
GK16andhvc4u:359: rasabhāvatadābhāsarūpe hi vyaṅgye tadyvañjakeṣu ca yathānirdiṣṭeṣu varṇapadavākyaracanāprabandheṣvavahitamanasaḥ kaveḥ sarvamapūrve kāvyaṃ sampadyate
GK16andhvc4u:360: tathā ca rāmāyaṇamahābhāratādiṣu saṅghāmādayaḥ punaḥpunarabhihitā api navanavāḥ prakāśante /
GK16andhvc4u:361: prabandhe cāṅgī rasa eka evopanibadhyamāno 'rthaviśeṣalābhaṃ chāyātiśayaṃ ca puṣṇāti /
GK16andhvc4u:362: kasminniveti cet---yathā rāmāyaṇe yathā vā mahābhārate /
GK16andhvc4u:363: rāmāyeṇe hi karuṇo rasaḥ svayamādikavināsūtritaḥ 'śokaḥ ślokatvamāgataḥ' ityevaṃvādinā /
GK16andhvc4u:364: nirvyūḍhaśca sa eva locanam kariṇīvaidhavyakaro mama putraḥ ekena kāṇḍena vinipātanasamarthaḥ hatasnuṣayā tathā kṛto yathā kāṇḍakaraṇakaṃ vahatītyuttāna
GK16andhvc4u:373: darśayatā mokṣalakṣaṇaḥ puruṣārthaḥ śānto rasaśca mukhyatayāvivakṣāviṣayatvena sūcitaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:375: svayamevacaitadudgīrṇa tenodīrṇamahāmohamagnamujjihīrṣatā lokamativimalajñānālokadāyinā lokanāthena--- yathā yathā viparyeti lokatantramasāravat
GK16andhvc4u:376: tathā tathā virāgo 'tra jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:382: yadyapi “dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ce“tyuktaṃ,
GK16andhvc4u:383: tathāpi catvāraścakārā evamāhuḥ--yadyapi dharmārthakāmānāṃ sarvasvaṃ tādṛṅnāsti yadanyatra na vidyate,
GK16andhvc4u:385: mokṣe tu yadrūpaṃ tasya sāratātraiva vicāryatāmiti /
GK16andhvc4u:394: virāgo jāyata ityanena tatvajñānotthitaṃ nirvedaṃ bālapriyā 'sītātyantaviyogaparyantamityatrātyantagrahaṇaphalamāha--atyantagrahaṇenetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:397: mokṣalakṣaṇaḥ puruṣārtho mukhyatayā vivakṣāviṣayatvena sūcita iti yaduktaṃ tasyānupapattimāśaṅkya pariharati--yadyapītyādinā /
GK16andhvc4u:399: kvaciddagranthe 'bharatarṣabha yadihāsti tadanyatra yannehāsti na tat kvaci'diti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:406: yadanyatra na vidyate tādṛgatra nāstīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:413: tataśca śānto raso rasāntarairmokṣalakṣaṇaḥ puruṣārthaḥ puruṣārthāntaraistadupasarjanatvenānugamyamāno 'ṅgitvena vivakṣāviṣaya iti mahābhāratatātparya suvyaktamevāvabhāsate /
GK16andhvc4u:415: pāramārthikāntastattvānapekṣayā śarīrasyevāṅgabhūtasya rasasya puruṣārthasya ca svaprādhānyena cārutvamapyaviruddham /
GK16andhvc4u:416: nanu mahābhārate yāvānvivakṣāviṣayaḥ so 'nukramaṇyāṃ sarva evānukrānto na caittatra dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc4u:417: pratyuta sarvapuruṣārthaprabodhahetutvaṃ sarvarasagarbhatvaṃ ca mahābhāratasya tasminnuddeśe svaśabdaniveditatvena pratīyate /
GK16andhvc4u:418: atrocyate--satyaṃ śāntasyaiva rasāsyāṅgitvaṃ mahābhārate mokṣasya ca sarvapuruṣārthabhyaḥ prādhānyamityetanna svaśabdābhidheyatvenānukramaṇyā
GK16andhvc4u:419: darśitaṃ tu vyaṅgyatvena--- 'bhagavānvāsudevaśca kīrtyate 'tra sanātanaḥ' ityasmin vākye /
GK16andhvc4u:420: anena hyayamartho vyaṅgyatvena vivakṣito yadatra mahābhārate pāṇḍavādicaritaṃ yatkīrtyate tatsarvamavasānavirasamavidyāprapañcarūpañca,
GK16andhvc4u:423: mā bhūta vibhūtiṣu niḥsārāsu rāgiṇo guṇeṣu vā nayavinayaparākramādiṣvamīṣu kevaleṣu keṣucitsarvātmanā pratiniviṣṭadhiyaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:424: tathā cāgre--paśyata niḥsāratāṃ saṃsārasyetyamumevārthe locanam śāntarasasthāyinaṃ sūcayatā tasyaiva ca sarvetarāsāratvaprati pādanena prādhānyamuktam
GK16andhvc4u:440: evaṃvidhamevārthe garbhīkṛtaṃ sandarśayanto 'nantaraślokā lakṣyante--'sa hi satyam' ityādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:441: ayaṃ ca nigūḍharamaṇīyo 'rtho mahābhāratāvasāne harivaṃśavarṇanena samāptiṃ vidadhatā tenaiva kavivedhasā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanena samyaksphuṭīkṛtaḥ
GK16andhvc4u:442: anena cārthena saṃsārātīte tattvāntare bhaktyatiśayaṃ pravartayatā sakala eva sāṃsāriko vyavahāraḥ pūrvapakṣīkṛto nyakṣeṇa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc4u:444: pāṇḍavādicaritavarṇanasyāpi vairāgyajananatātparyādvairāgyasya ca mokṣamūlatvānmokṣasya ca bhagavatprāptyupāyatvena mukhyatayā gītādiṣu pradarśitatvātparabrahmaprāptyupāyatvameva
GK16andhvc4u:445: paramparayā vāsudevādisañjñābhidheyatvena cāparimitaśaktyāspadaṃ paraṃ brahma gītādipradeśāntareṣu
GK16andhvc4u:450: vibhūtiṣu rāgiṇo guṇeṣu ca niviṣṭadhiyo mā bhūteti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:451: agra iti anukramaṇyanantaraṃ yo bhāratagranthaḥ tatretyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:466: māthuro yaḥ prādurbhāvastenānukṛtaṃ sakalasvarūpaṃ yena tat /
GK16andhvc4u:473: tadevamanukramaṇīnirdiṣṭena vākyena bhagavadyvatirekiṇaḥ sarvasyānyasyānityatāṃ prakāśayatā mokṣalakṣaṇa evaikaḥ paraḥ puruṣārthaḥ śāstranaye,
GK16andhvc4u:474: kāvyanaye ca tṛṣṇākṣayasukhaparipoṣalakṣaṇaḥ śānto raso mahābhāratasyāṅgitvena vivakṣita iti supratipāditam /
GK16andhvc4u:475: atyantasārabhūtatvāccāyamartho vyaṅgyatvenaiva darśito na tu vācyatvena /
GK16andhvc4u:476: sārabhūto hyarthaḥ svaśabdānabhidheyatvena prakāśitaḥ sutarāmeva śobhāmāvahati /
GK16andhvc4u:477: prasiddhiśceyamastyeva vidagghavidvatpariṣatsu yadabhimatataraṃ vastu vyaṅgyatvena prakāśyate na sākṣācchabdavācyatvena /
GK16andhvc4u:480: śabdā hi nityā eva santo 'nantaraṃ kākatālīyavaśāttathā saṅketitā ityuktam--“ṛṣyandhakavṛṣṇikurubhyaśce“tyatra /
GK16andhvc4u:484: etacca granthakāreṇa tattvāloke vitaktyoktamiha tvasya na mukhyo 'vasara iti nāsmābhistaddarśitam /
GK16andhvc4u:488: anyathā hi kriyākārakasambandhādau 'nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtye'tyādiśabdārthanirūpaṇe ca tathāvidha eva tasya bhagavata āśaya ityatra kiṃ pramāṇāmiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:497: kāvyanaye tu śānto rasa ityuktaṃ vivṛṇoti--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:509: evaṃ nārāyaṇādipadānāṃ viṣṇvādayo 'rthāśca tadvivakṣā ca tasmātsthitametat--aṅgibhūtarasādyāśrayeṇa kāvye kriyamāṇe navārthalābho bhavati bandhacchāyā ca mahatī sampadyata iti /
GK16andhvc4u:510: ata eva ca rasānuguṇārthaviśeṣopanibandhamalaṅkārāntaravirahe 'pi chāyātiśayayogi lakṣye dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc4u:516: kṣuṇṇaṃ hi vastu locanam ata iti /
GK16andhvc4u:517: yata evaṃ sthitaṃ ata evedamapi yallakṣye dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc4u:525: nanu matsyakacchapadarśanātpratīyamānaṃ yadekaculake jalanidhisannidhānaṃ tato munermāhātmyapratipattiriti na rasānuguṇenārthena cchāyāpoṣitetyāśaṅkyāha--atra hīti /
GK16andhvc4u:526: nanvevaṃ pratīyamānaṃ jalanidhidarśanamevādbhutānuguṇaṃ bhavatviti rasānuguṇo 'tra vācyo 'rtha ityasminnaṃśe kathamidamudāharaṇamityāśaṅkyāha--tatreti
GK16andhvc4u:543: he subhaga tvaṃ yena tasyā yena pārśveṇa atikrāntaḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:550: sopāso ajja vi suhaa jeṇāsi volīṇo // //
GK16andhvc4u:552: sā tvāṃ spṛṣṭvā svidyati romāñcate vepate ityevaṃvidhādarthātpratīyamānānmanāgapi no jāyate /
GK16andhvc4u:553: tadevaṃ dhvaniprabhedasamāśrayeṇa yathā kāvyārthānāṃ navatvaṃ jāyate tathā pratipāditam /
GK16andhvc4u:554: guṇībhūtvayaṅgyasyāpi tribhedavyaṅgyāpekṣayā ye prakārāstatsamāśrayeṇāpi kāvyavastūnāṃ navatvaṃ bhavatyeva /
GK16andhvc4u:557: rathyāyāntulāgreṇa kākatālīyena pratilagnassā mukhyena sa pārśvo 'dyāpi subhaga tasyā yenāsyatikrāntaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:562: dhvaneradhvanā kavīnāṃ pratibhāguṇo 'nanto bhavatotyeṣa bhāgo vyākhyāta ityupasaṃharati--tadevamityādinā /
GK16andhvc4u:564: triprabhedo vastvalaṅkārarasātmanā yo vyaṅgyaḥ tasya yāpekṣā vācyeguṇībhāvaḥ tayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:565: tatra sarve ye dhvanibhedāsteṣāṃ guṇībhāvādānantyamiti tadāha--ativistareti /
GK16andhvc4u:567: tatra vastunā vyaṅgyena guṇībhūtena navatvaṃ satyapa purāṇārthasparśe yathā mamaiva-- bhaavihalarakhkhaṇekakamallasaraṇāgaāṇaaththāṇa /
GK16andhvc4u:569: atra tvamanavaratamarthāstyajasīti audāryalakṣaṇaṃ vastu dhvanyamānaṃ vācyasyopaskārakaṃ bālapriyā tribhedavyaṅgyāpekṣayetyetadvyācaṣṭe--triprabheda ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:580: alaṅkāreṇa vyaṅgyena vācyopaskāre navatvaṃ yathā mamaiva-- vasantamattāliparamparopamāḥ kacāstavāsan kala rāgavṛddhaye /
GK16andhvc4u:582: atra hyākṣepeṇa vibhāvanayā ca dhvanyamānābhyāṃ vācyamupaskṛtamiti navatvaṃ satyapi purāṇārthayogitve /
GK16andhvc4u:586: vyaṅgyena rasena guṇībhūtena vācyopaskāreṇa navatvaṃ yathā mameva-- jarā neyaṃ mūrdhni dhruvamayamasau kālabhujagaḥ krudhāndhaḥ phūtkāraiḥ sphuṭagaralaphenān prakirati // //
GK16andhvc4u:587: tadenaṃ saṃpaśyatyatha ca sukhitammanyahṛdayaḥ śivo pāyannecchan bata bata sudhīraḥ khalu janaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:594: vasante vasantena vā mattā ye alayo bhṛṅgāstatparamparopamāḥ teṣāṃ paramparayā tulyāḥ atinīlasnigdhā iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc4u:597: śmaśānabhūbhāge ye parāgāḥ bhasmareṇavaste iva bhāsurāḥ śubhrāḥ jarayā śuklā iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc4u:600: tava manāgīṣadupi viraktaye vairāgyāya na bhavanti /
GK16andhvc4u:601: tat tathaṃ vairāgyasya kāraṇe satyapi tadajananaṃ kuta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:602: anena pratyuta kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāma eva vardhanta ityarthasya kāmasya mahimā varṇayitumaśakya ityarthasya ca prakāśanādvibhāvanākṣepau vyajyete,
GK16andhvc4u:607: mūrdhni iyaṃ dṛśyamānā jarā na bhavati /
GK16andhvc4u:611: phūtkāraiḥ sphuṭaṃ garalaṃ yeṣu tathābhūtān phenān prakirati varṣati /
GK16andhvc4u:615: na kāvyārtha-virāmo 'sti yadi syāt pratibhā-guṇaḥ // DhvK_4.6 //
GK16andhvc4u:623: vācyamupaskṛtaṃ śāntarasapratipatyaṅgatvāccāru bhavatīti navatvaṃ satyapyasmin purāṇaśloke
GK16andhvc4u:627: trīn pādān spaṣṭānmatvā turyaṃ pādaṃ vyākhyātuṃ paṭhati--yadīti /
GK16andhvc4u:628: vidyamāno hyasau pratibhāgaṇa uktarītyā bhūyān bhavati,
GK16andhvc4u:633: sarva hi purāṇakavinaiva spṛṣṭamiti kimidānīṃ varṇyaṃ,
GK16andhvc4u:647: sampaśyati atha ca sukhitamanyahṛdayaḥ śivopāyaṃ necchaṃśca /
GK16andhvc4u:659: itīdaṃ sahṛdayānāṃ na nedīya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:672: śabdārthayoḥ sāhityena kāvyatve kathaṃ tathāvidhe viṣaye kāvyavyavastheti cet---paropanibaddhārthaviracane yathā tatkāvyatvavyavahārastathā tathāvidhānāṃ kāvyasandarbhāṇām /
GK16andhvc4u:675: ānantyam eva vācyasya śuddhasyāpi svabhāvataḥ // DhvK_4.7 //
GK16andhvc4u:679: svabhāvo hyayaṃ vācyānāṃ cetanānāmacetanānāṃ ca yadavasthābhedāddeśabhedātkālabhedātsvālakṣaṇyabhedāccānantatā bhavati /
GK16andhvc4u:680: taiśca tathāvyavasthitaiḥ sadbhiḥ prasiddhānekasvabhāvānusaraṇarūpayā svabhāvoktyāpi tāvadupanibadhyamānairniravadhiḥ locanam caturatvaṃ samāsasaṅghaṭanā
GK16andhvc4u:685: na tvayaṃ bhāvapratyayāntāt bhāvapratyaya iti śaṅkitavyam // 6 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:688: yadi vā vācyantābadvividhavyaṅgyopayogi tadeva cedanantaṃ tadbalādeva vyaṅgyānantyaṃ bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇedaṃ prakṛtamevocyate /
GK16andhvc4u:690: vyaṅgyaviṣayo yo vyāpāraḥ tatsparśaṃ vināpyānantyaṃ svarūpamātreṇaiva paścāttu tathā svarūpeṇānantaṃ sadvyaṅgyaṃ vyanaktīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:691: na tu sarvathā tatra vyaṅgyaṃ nāstīti mantavyamātmabhūtatadrūpābhāve kāvyavyavahārahāneḥ;
GK16andhvc4u:714: saiva ca punarnavodvāhasamaye prasādhyamānā 'tāṃ prāṅmukhīṃ tatra niveśya tanvīm' ityādyuktirbhirnavenaiva prakāreṇa nirūpitarūpasauṣṭhavā /
GK16andhvc4u:715: na ca te tasya kaverekatraivāsakṛtkṛtā varṇanaprakārā apunaruktatvena vā navanavārthanirbharatvena vā pratibhāsante /
GK16andhvc4u:716: darśitameva caitadviṣamabāṇalīlāyām--- ṇa a tāṇa ghaḍai ohī ṇa a te dīsanti kaha vi punaruttā /
GK16andhvc4u:717: je vibbhamā piāṇaṃ atthā vā sukaivāṇīṇam // //
GK16andhvc4u:718: ayamaparaścāvasthābhedaprakāro yadacetanānāṃ sarveṣāṃ cetanaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpamabhimānitvaprasiddhaṃ himavadgaṅgādīnām /
GK16andhvc4u:720: yathā kumārasambhava eva parvatasvarūpasya himavato varṇanaṃ,
GK16andhvc4u:721: punaḥ saptarṣipriyoktiṣu cetanatassvarūpāpekṣayā pradarśitaṃ tadapūrvameva pratibhāti /
GK16andhvc4u:723: idaṃ locanam na ca teṣāṃ ghaṭate 'vadhiḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:724: na ca te dṛśyante kathamapi punaruktāḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:728: prayatnenāpi vicāryamāṇaṃ paunaruktyaṃ na labhyamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc4u:730: bahuvallabho hi subhago rādhāvallabhaprāyastāstāḥ kāminīḥ paribhogasubhagamupabhuñjāno 'pi na vibhramapaunaruktyaṃ paśyati tadā /
GK16andhvc4u:737: te varṇanaprakārāḥ na ca bhāsanta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:741: priyāṇāṃ vibhramāḥ kathamapi punaruktā na dṛśyanta ityetadvivṛṇoti--bahuvallabha ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:745: ca prasthānaṃ kavivyutpattaye viṣamabāṇalīlāyāṃ saprapañcaṃ darśitam /
GK16andhvc4u:751: yathā--- haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu yaiḥ kavalitairāsajyate kūjatā- manyaḥ ko 'pi kaṣāyakaṇṭhaluṭhanādāghargharo vibhramaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:754: locanam kṣaṇe kṣaṇe yannavatāmupaiti tadeva rūpaṃ ramaṇīyatāyā iti /
GK16andhvc4u:755: priyāṇāmiti cāsaṃsāraṃ pravahadrūparo yo 'yaṃ kāntānāṃ vibhramaviśeṣaḥ sa navanava eva dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc4u:760: bālapriyā priyāṇāṃ vibhramā ityanena gamyamarthamāha---priyāṇāmiti cetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:783: yaiḥ kūjatāṃ haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu kaṣāyakaṇṭhaluṇṭhanādāghargharaḥ anyaḥ ko 'pi vibhramaḥ āsajyate āsaktaḥ kriyata ityādyanyayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:784: tacca yathāvasthitamapi tāvadupanibadhyamānamityatra tāvatpadaṃ locane vivṛṇoti--uttarakālantvityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:787: cetanānāmapi mānuṣapaśupakṣiprabhṛtīnāṃ grāmāraṇyasalilādisamedhitānāṃ parasparaṃ mahānviśeṣaḥ samupalakṣyata eva /
GK16andhvc4u:789: tathā hi---mānuṣāṇāmeva tāvaddigdeśādibhinnānāṃ ye vyavahāravyāpārādiṣu vicitrā viśeṣāsteṣāṃ kenāntaḥ śakyate gantum,
GK16andhvc4u:797: atra kecidācakṣarin---yathā sābhānyātmanā vastūni vācyatāṃ pratipadyante na viśeṣātmanā;
GK16andhvc4u:798: tāni hi svayamanubhūtānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ tannimittānāṃ ca svarūpamanyatrāropayadbhiḥ svaparānubhūtarūpasāmānyamātrāśrayeṇopanibadhyante kavibhiḥ
GK16andhvc4u:799: na hi tairatītamanāgataṃ vartamānañca aparicitādisvalakṣaṇaṃ yogibhiriva pratyakṣīkrīyate;
GK16andhvc4u:804: tāvati tu svabhāvenaiva sā vicitreti tāvacchabdasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:819: ata eva sa prakāraviśeṣo yairadyatanairabhinavatvena pratīyate teṣāmabhimāna mātrameva bhaṇitakṛtaṃ vaicitryamātramatrāstīti /
GK16andhvc4u:820: tatrocyate--yattūktaṃ sāmānyamātrāśrayeṇa kāvyapravṛttistasya ca parimitatvena prāgeva
GK16andhvc4u:821: gocarīkṛtatvānnāsti navatvaṃ kāvyapravṛttistasya ca parimitatvena prāgeva gocarīkṛtatvānnāsti
GK16andhvc4u:824: yato yadi sāmānyamātramāśritya kāvyaṃ pravartate kiṅkṛtastarhi mahākavinibadhyamānānāṃ kāvyarthānāmatiśayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:825: vālmikivyatiriktasyānyasya kavivyapadeśa eva vā sāmānyavyatiriktasyānyasya kāvyārthasyabhāvāt,
GK16andhvc4u:831: locanam pratyakṣadarśane 'pi hi--- śabdāssaṃketitaṃ prāhurvyavahārāya sa sbhṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:832: tadā svalakṣaṇaṃ nāsti saṅketastena tatra naḥ // //
GK16andhvc4u:838: paryāyamātrataiva yadyuktiviśeṣastatparyāyāntarairavikalaṃ tadarthopanibandhe apaunaruktyābhimāno na bhavati /
GK16andhvc4u:844: anubhāvyānāmanubhavitavyānāṃ vastūnāmanubhavānāṃ ca yat sāmānyaṃ sāmānyasvarūpamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:854: kāvyavaicitryamavasthādiviśeṣātkiṃ punaruktamevāstu na cettathā tatkarthaṃ na kāvyānantyam' ityapi pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:861: vācyānāṃ ca kāvye pratibhāsamānānāṃ yadrūpaṃ tattu grāhyaviśeṣābhedenaiva pratīyate /
GK16andhvc4u:866: yato yāvānayaṃ kāvyārthānantyabhedahetuḥ prakāraḥ prāgdarśitaḥ sa sarva eva punaruktivaicitryāddviguṇatāmāpadyate /
GK16andhvc4u:869: grāhyaḥ pratyakṣādipramāṇairyo viśeṣaḥ tasya yo abhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:870: tenāyamarthaḥ--padānāntāvatsāmānye vā tadvati vāpohe vā yatra kutrāpi vastuni samayaḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:872: vākyāttadviśeṣaḥ pratīyata iti kasyātra vādino vimatiḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:905: nanu nibhapratimādiśabdānāṃ samānārthakatvāt kathaṃ ta citryamityata āha---vastuta ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:908: ralaṅkāravargaḥ prasiddha sa bhaṇitivaicitryādupanibadhyamānaḥ svayamevānavadhirdhatte punaḥ śataśākhatām /
GK16andhvc4u:909: bhaṇitiśca svabhāṣābhedena vyavasthitā satī pratiniyatabhāṣāgocarārthavaicitryanibandhanaṃ punaraparaṃ kāvyārthānāmānantyamāpādayati /
GK16andhvc4u:910: yathā mamaiva--- mahamaha itti bhaṇantau vajjadi kālo jaṇassa /
GK16andhvc4u:911: toi ṇa deu jaṇaddaṇa goarī bhodi maṇaso // //
GK16andhvc4u:912: itthaṃ yathā yathā nirūpyate tathā tathā na labhyate 'ntaḥ kāvyārthānām /
GK16andhvc4u:914: yatpradarśitaṃ prāk locanam tadanukāratayā tu pratimaśabda ityevaṃ sarvatra vācyaṃ kevalaṃ bālopayogi kāvyaṭīkāpariśīlanadaurātmyādeṣu paryāyatvabhrama iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:917: pratiniyatāyā bhāṣāyā gocaro vācyoyo 'rthastatkṛtaṃ yadvaicitryaṃ tannibandhanaṃ nimittaṃ yasya,
GK16andhvc4u:921: mama mama iti bhaṇato vrajati kālo heturdarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:922: tathāpi na devo janārdano gocaro bhavati manasaḥ // //
GK16andhvc4u:924: tasya kathanna devo manogocaro bhavatīti vīrodhālaṅkāracchāyā /
GK16andhvc4u:934: mama mama iti bhaṇataḥ mamāyaṃ mamedamityādi bhaṇataḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:939: mahamaha ityasya mama mama iti madhumathana iti ca chāyā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ // 7 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:940: ita ūrdhvaṅkārikāvṛtyorbhedasya durgrahatayā tadubhayaṃ pṛthakpradarśayan vivṛṇoti--avasthetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:953: nibaddhā sā kṣayaṃ naiti prakṛtir jagatām iva // DhvK_4.10 //
GK16andhvc4u:956: yathāhi jagatprakṛtiratītakalpaparamparāvirbhūtavicitravastuprapañcā satī locanam bhūmnaiva dṛśyate lakṣye tattu bhāti rasāśrayāt // //
GK16andhvc4u:964: 'yatpradarśitaṃ prāgi'ti 'na tacchakyamapohitum' iti ca grantha ityarthaḥ // 8 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:983: atītānāṃ kalpanāṃ paramparāyāmāvirbhūntaḥ āvirbhāvitaḥ vicitrāṇāṃ vastūnāṃ prapañco yayā sā 'parī'ti /
GK16andhvc4u:989: saṃvādās tu bhavanty eva bāhulyena sumedhasām /
GK16andhvc4u:990: sthitaṃ hy etat saṃvādinya eva medhāvināṃ buddhayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:992: naika-rūpatayā sarve te mantavyā vipaścitā // DhvK_4.11 //
GK16andhvc4u:994: sthitaṃ hyetat saṃvādinya eva medhāvināṃ buddhayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:995: kintu-- naikarūpatayā sarve te mantavyā vipaścitā // 11 //
GK16andhvc4u:996: kathamiti cet--- saṃvādo hyanyasādṛśyaṃ tatpunaḥ pratibimbavat /
GK16andhvc4u:998: saṃvādo hi kāvyārthasyocyate yadanyena kāvyavastunā sādṛśyam /
GK16andhvc4u:1001: locanam saṃvādā iti kāri kāyā ardhaṃ,
GK16andhvc4u:1005: saṃvādo hy anya-sādṛśyaṃ tat punaḥ pratibimbavat /
GK16andhvc4u:1016: atra sumedhasāṃ saṃvādā ityasya sumedhasāṃ buddhīnāṃ kāvyānāṃ ca saṃvādā ityartha
GK16andhvc4u:1017: ityabhipretya 'sthitaṃ hyetadi'tyādikaṃ 'saṃvādo hi kāvyārthasyocyata' iti ca vṛttāvuktamiti bodhyam //11 //
GK16andhvc4u:1021: ata eva vakṣyate--keṣucit pustakeṣu kārikā akhaṇḍīkṛtā eva dṛśyanta iti /
GK16andhvc4u:1022: khaṇḍīkṛtya vyākhyānaṃ tu 'saṃvādo hyanyasādṛśyam' 'saṃvādo hi kāvyārthasyocyate,
GK16andhvc4u:1030: tṛtīyaṃ tu prasiddhātma nānya-sāmyaṃ tyajet kaviḥ // DhvK_4.13 //
GK16andhvc4u:1033: tatra pūrvaṃ pratibimbakalpaṃ kāvyavastu parihartavyaṃ sumatinā /
GK16andhvc4u:1036: tṛtīyaṃ tu vibhinnakamanīyaśarīrasadbhāve sati sasaṃvādamapi kāvyavastu na tyaktavyaṃ kavinā /
GK16andhvc4u:1037: na hi śarīrī śarīriṇānyena sadṛśo 'pyeka eveti śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc4u:1042: ananyaḥ pūrvopanibandhakāvyādātmā svabhāvo yasya tadananyātma yena rūpeṇa bhāti tatprākkavispṛṣṭameva,
GK16andhvc4u:1047: evaṃ prathamaṃ prakāraṃ vyākhyāya dvitīyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--tadanantarantviti /
GK16andhvc4u:1051: anukāre hyanukāryabuddhireva citrapustādāviva na tu sindūrādibuddhiḥ sphurati,
GK16andhvc4u:1056: pratibimbe anyasādṛśyaṃ śarīriṇā bimbena sādṛśyamevamālekhyākāratulyadehanośca śarīriṇā sādṛśyaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc4u:1059: nānyasāmyaṃ tyajetkavirityuktyā gamyasyārthasya vivaraṇaṃ vṛttau 'parihartavyaṃ sumatine'ti /
GK16andhvc4u:1061: tātvikaśarīraśūnyamityananyātmetyasya vivaraṇamityanyathā pratipattiḥ syādityato locane vivṛṇota--ananya ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1077: vastu bhātitarāṃ tanvyāḥ śaśi-cchāyam ivānanam // DhvK_4.14 //
GK16andhvc4u:1080: tattvasya sārabhūtasyātmanaḥ saddhāve 'nyasya pūrvasthityanuyāyyapi vastu bhātitarām /
GK16andhvc4u:1081: purāṇaramaṇīyacchāyānugṛhītaṃ hi vastu śarīravatparāṃ śobhāṃ puṣyati /
GK16andhvc4u:1084: evaṃ tāvatsasaṃvādānāṃ samudāyarūpāṇāṃ vākyārthānāṃ vibhaktāḥ sīmānaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1085: padārtharūpāṇāṃ ca vastvantarasadṛśānāṃ kāvyavastūnāṃ nāstyeva doṣa iti pratipādayitumucyate--
GK16andhvc4u:1087: nūtane sphurati kāvya-vastuni vyaktam eva khalu sā na duṣyati // DhvK_4.15 //
GK16andhvc4u:1089: nūtane sphurati kāvyavastuni vyaktameva khalu sāna duṣyati // 15 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:1090: na hi vācyaspatināpyakṣarāṇi padāni vā kānicidapūrvāṇi ghaṭayituṃ locanam etadeveti tṛtīyasya rūpasyātyājyatvam /
GK16andhvc4u:1095: ātmana ityasya śabdasya pūrvapaṭhitābhyāmeva tatvasya sārabhūtasyeti ca padābhyāmartho nirūpitaḥ // 14 //
GK16andhvc4u:1097: saṃvādānāmiti tu pāṭhe vākyārtharūpāṇāṃ samudāyānāṃ ye saṃvādāḥ teṣāmiti vaiyadhikaraṇyena saṃgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1098: vastuśabtadena eko vā dvau vā trayo bālapriyā etadevetyatratyaitatpadārthavivaraṇam--tṛtīyasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1099: ātmana ityasyārtho nirūpita iti sambandhaḥ tattvasya sārabhūtasyeti cātmapadārthavivaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1104: purāṇī ramaṇīyā ca yā chāyā tayānugṛhītamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1108: tāni tu tānyevopanibaddhāni na kāvyādiṣu navatāṃ virudhyanti /
GK16andhvc4u:1110: tasmāt-- yadapi tadapi ramyaṃ yatra lokasya kiñcit-sphuritamidamitīyaṃ buddhirabhyujjihīte /
GK16andhvc4u:1124: sadvṛttatejasviguṇadvijādayo hi śabdāḥ pūrvapūrvairapi kavisahasraiḥ śleṣacchāyayā nibadhyante,
GK16andhvc4u:1126: tathaiva padārtharūpāṇītyatra nāpūrvāṇi ghaṭayituṃ śakyante ityādi virudhyantītyevamantaṃ prāktanaṃ vākyamabhisandhānīyam // 15 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:1133: yadapi tadapi ramyaṃ yatra lokasya kiñci- tsphuritamidamitīyaṃ buddhirabhyujjihīte /
GK16andhvc4u:1147: yatretyasya sthāne yā tviti vā pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1153: idaṃ kiñcit sphuritamitīyaṃ buddhiḥ lokasya ujjihīte ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1154: tadanugatamapi pūrvacchāyayā vastu tādṛk tādṛkṣaṃ sukavirvivakṣitavyaṅgyavācyārthasamarpaṇasamarthaśabdaracanārūpayā bandhacchāyayopanibadhnannindhatāṃ naiva yāti /
GK16andhvc4u:1155: taditthaṃ sthitam--- pratāyantāṃ vāco nimitavividhārthāmṛtarasā na sādaḥ kartavyaḥ kavibhiranavadye svaviṣaye /
GK16andhvc4u:1156: santi navāḥ kāvyārthāḥ paropanibaddhārthaviracane na kaścitkaverguṇa iti bhāvayitvā /
GK16andhvc4u:1158: sarasvaty evaiṣā ghaṭayati yatheṣṭaṃ bhagavatī // DhvK_4.17 //
GK16andhvc4u:1161: locanam anugatamipi pūrvacchāyayā vastu tādṛksukavirupanibadhnannindyatāṃ nopayati // //
GK16andhvc4u:1165: parasvādānecchetyādidvitīyaṃ ślokārdhaṃ pūrvopaskārema saha paṭhati--parasvādānecchāviratamanaso bālapriyā tatra lokasyetyādervivaraṇaṃ vṛttau 'sphuraṇeyam' ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1172: nimitāḥ tulitāḥ vividhārthāmṛtarasāḥ amṛtarasatulyāḥ vividhārthāḥ yābhiḥ tāḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:1184: 'yatheṣṭaṃ' kaveriṣṭamanatikramya iti kārikārthaṃ spaṣṭaṃ matvā svaviṣaya ityatra pūrayati locane--svayaṃ tātkālikatvenāsphurita iti /
GK16andhvc4u:1188: karikāpūrvārdhapāṭhānantaraṃ santī parasvādānecchāviratamanasaḥ sukaveḥ sarasvatyeṣā bhagavatī yatheṣṛṃ ghaṭayati vastu /
GK16andhvc4u:1189: yeṣāṃ sukavīnāṃ prāktanapuṇyābhyāsaparipākavaśena pravṛttisteṣāṃ paroparacatārthaparigrahaniḥspṛhāṇāṃ svavyāpāro na kvacidupayujyate /
GK16andhvc4u:1194: kutaḥ khalvapūrvamānayāmītyāśayena nirudyogaḥ paropanibaddhavastūpajīvako vā syādatyāśaṅkyāha--sarasvatyeveti /
GK16andhvc4u:1202: akliṣṭā rasāśrayeṇa ucitā ye guṇālaṅkārāstato yā śobhā tāṃ bibharti kāvyam /
GK16andhvc4u:1203: udyānamapyakliṣṭaḥ kālocito yo lasaḥ sekādikṛtaḥ tadāśrayastatkṛto yo guṇānāṃ saukumāryacchāyāvatvasaugandhyaprabhṛtīnamalaṅkāraḥ paryāptatākāraṇaṃ tena ca yā śobhā tāṃ bibharti /
GK16andhvc4u:1208: tasya parasvādānecchāviratamanasa ityatra viratetyanena sambandhaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1216: kārikā ca tadvṛttiśca tābhyāṃ yannirūpaṇaṃ tatprakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1218: akliṣṭeti śobhāyāḥ rasāśrayociteti guṇālaṅkārayośca viśeṣaṇamiti darśayan vyācaṣṭe--akliṣṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1226: kāvyākhye 'khilasaukhyadhāmni vibudhodyāne dhvanirdarśitaḥ so 'yaṃ kalparūpamānamahimā bhogyo 'stu bhavyātmanām //
GK16andhvc4u:1228: locanam etacca sarvaṃ pūrvameva vitatyoktamiti ślokārthamātraṃ vyākhyātam /
GK16andhvc4u:1230: ye kaṣṭopadeśenāpi vinā tathāvi dhaphalabhājaḥ tairityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1232: akhilaṃ duḥkhaleśenāpyananuviddhaṃ yatsaukhyaṃ tasya dhāmni ekāyatana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1233: sarvathā priyaṃ sarvathā ca hitaṃ durlabhaṃ jagatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1240: kalpataruṇā upamānaṃ yasya tādṛṅmahimā yasyeti bahuvrīhigarbho bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1245: tathāvidhāni vyutpatyādīni phalāni bhajante tadbhajanaśīlāḥ tadarhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1249: nāsti khilaṃ yasmiṃstadakhilaṃ iti bahuvrīhiścetyāśayena vivṛṇoti--duḥkhetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1259: atra kalpatarusāmyasya mahimni śabdena bodhane 'pi mahimāśraye dhvanau tasya paryavasānaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc4u:1260: kāvyaṃ nandanodyānena tulyaṃ dhvaniḥ kalpatarutulyaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1271: dhvanisvarūpaṃ tatsā tadyvākarotsahṛdayodayalābhaheto- rānandavardhana iti prathitābhidhānaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:1272: iti śrīrājānakānandavardhanācāryaviracite dhvanyāloke caturtha uddyotaḥ samāpto 'yaṃ granthaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:1274: iha bāhulyena loko lokaprasiṣyā sambhāvanāpratyayabalena pravartate /
GK16andhvc4u:1277: evaṃvidhassāro dṛśyate tasyāyaṃ ślokaprabandhastasmādādaraṇīyametadita lokaḥ pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc4u:1281: prathitaśabdenaitadeva prathitaṃ yattu bālapriyā dhakaṃ yuktajātaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1284: sahṛdayānāṃ ya udaya abhyudayaḥ dhvanisvarūpāvabodhahetukā prītiḥ tallābhasya hetoḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1287: ślokārthaṃ spaṣṭaṃ matvā vaktavyamaṃśaṃ vivṛṇoti locane---satkāvyetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1303: sa ca sambhāvanā pratyayo bhavatīti sambandha- /
GK16andhvc4u:1313: niśreyasaprayojanādeva hi śrutātko 'pi rāgāndho yadi nivartate kimetāvatā prayojanamaprayojanamapyavaśyaṃ vaktavyameva syāt /
GK16andhvc4u:1339: prathamodyotānte parāyā dvitīyodyotānte paśyantyāstṛtīyodyotānte madhyamāyāśca vandanaṃ kṛtavān granthakāraḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:1341: sphuṭīkṛtāni vaktrā manasi spaṣṭīkṛtāni yāni arthavaicitryāṇi vicitrārthāḥ teṣāṃ yaḥbahiḥprasaraḥ śrotṛjaneṣu prakāśaḥ taddāyinīm /
GK16andhvc4u:1348: ānandavardhanasya yo vivekaḥ vivicyatattadarthāvabodhaḥ tena vikāsī prakāśamāno yaḥ kāvyalokastasya yānyarthatatvāni sārārthāḥ teṣāṃ ghaṭanātsaṃyojanāddhetoḥ
GK16andhvc4u:1350: kiñca yat pronmiṣat sahṛdayeṣu prakāśamānamatha ca prakarṣeṇa unmiṣat sat sakalānāṃ
GK16andhvc4u:1351: sarveṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāvyādīnāṃ sadviṣayān sārārthān sakalān sadviṣayānvā atha ca sakalānāṃ
GK16andhvc4u:1352: sarveṣāṃ kāvyādīnāṃ sadbiṣayān sārārthān sakalān sadviṣayān vā atha ca sakalān sadviṣayān
GK16andhvc4u:1353: vidyamānān padārthān prakāśayatīti tathā bhavati tat tathāvidham /
GK16andhvc4u:1355: atha ca abhinavaṃ navīnāṃ guptamanyeṣāmaviditaṃ ca locanamālocanaṃ jñānaṃ netraṃ ca vyāpāryata ātmanā vyāpāritam /
GK16andhvc4u:1359: śrīmataḥ siddhicelasya tannāmnaḥ guroḥ caraṇābjaparāgaiḥ pūto yo locanam śrīsiddhicelacaraṇābjaparāgapūtabhaṭṭendurājamatisaṃskṛtabuddhileśaḥ
GK16andhvc4u:1361: sajjanān kavirasau na yācate hlādanāya śaśamṛtkimarthitaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1362: naiva nindati khalānmuhurmuhuḥ dhikkṛto 'pi na hi śītalo 'nalaḥ // //
GK16andhvc4u:1364: nāśivaṃ kvacana kasyacidvacaḥ tena vaśśivamayī daśā bhavet //
GK16andhvc4u:1365: iti mahāmāheśvarābhinavaguptaviracite kāvyālokalocane caturtha udyotaḥ samāptaścāvaṃ granthaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:1366: bālapriyā bhaṭṭendurājaḥ tasya matyā jñānena saṃskṛto buddhileśo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1379: kuto na yācata ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntapradarśanena parihariti---śaśabhṛtkimarthita iti /
GK16andhvc4u:1383: candra iva sajjanaḥ svayameva parānāhlādayatīti candrasyeva parāhlādanaṃ sajjanasya svabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1387: khalānnaiva nindati kuta ityata āha---na hītyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1390: na hi yathā agniḥ sarvadā uṣṇasvabhāva eva tathā khalajanaḥ paradūṣaṇasvabhāva eva,
GK16andhvc4u:1393: atha paramamāheśvaro granthakāro granthānte paramaśivānusandhānātmakaṃ paramamaṅgalamanutiṣṭhannāha---vastuta ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1394: janasya hṛdi hṛdaye vastutaḥ śivamaye sati śivamaye hṛdīti vā yojanā,
GK16andhvc4u:1395: sarvataḥ sarvaṃ vastu sphuṭaṃ śivamayaṃ virājate bhāti /
GK16andhvc4u:1397: kvacana kvacidapi kasyacidvacaḥ aśivaṃ na bhavati,
GK16andhvc4u:1399: anena vastutaḥ śivamaye svasya hṛdaye sarvaṃ śivamayaṃ bhāti /
GK16andhvc4u:1404: śivamayī maṅgalamayī daśā bhavet bhavatviti sarvaṃ śivam /
GK16andhvc4u:1415: prauḍhaṃ kva locanaṃ kvāhaṃ mandadhīrbahudhātra tat /
GK16andhvc4u:1417: iti śrīsahṛdayatilaka paṇḍitarāja birudadvayaśālinā rāmanāmnā śārakeṇa viracitāyāṃ kāvyālokalocanaṭippaṇyāṃ bālapriyākhyāyāṃ caturtha udyotaḥ samāpto 'yaṃ granthaḥ //
